snippet.title: Melvor Idle v1.0 is coming 18 November, 2021!
snippet.description:
Melvor Idle v1.0 is coming 18 November, 2021!

Games by Malcs and Jagex have partnered to release the full version of this Runescape-inspired idle game, which started as a personal project by solo developer Brendan (Malcs) Malcolm two years ago.

Melvor Idle leaves early access on 18 November with the largest update yet (and a 6,000 word change log, you’re welcome). 

TL;DR
- 20+ Skills
- Localisation in 12 languages
- Perilous dungeons, terrifying monsters
- Offline progression
- Tutorial Island
- Statistics 2.0
- Thriving community online

PLAY NOW!

GooglePlay Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.malcs.melvoridle 
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/melvor-idle/id1518963622
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1267910/Melvor_Idle/

FOLLOW US!

Discord: https://discord.gg/melvoridle 
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/MelvorIdle/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MelvorIdle
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/melvoridle 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/melvoridle/ 
Melvor Idle Website: https://melvoridle.com/ 
Games By Malcs: https://www.gamesbymalcs.com/ 
Jagex Partners: https://jagex.com/partners
